video.title: Harry and His Bucket Full of Dinosaurs
video.synopsis: Five-year-old boy Harry takes his dinosaur toys on many adventures to the magical land of Dino World, where he learns to solve childhood challenges.

episodes.synopsis: Harry goes to Dino World to hide from a monster that's chasing him in a nightmare. / Harry decides to hide his library book in Dino World.
episodes.title: Aaaggghh!/Overdue

episodes.synopsis: Harry faces losing his hair as a result of his filthiness. / Charlie brings her new kitten, Buster, over to Harry's house for a visit.
episodes.title: But I Like Mud/It's a Kitty!

episodes.synopsis: Unable to join in with family activities, Harry heads to Dino World to invent his own clubs. / Untidy Harry moves the mess in his room to Dino World.
episodes.title: Can I Join? / What Mess?

episodes.synopsis: Harry accidentally smashes his mother's beloved teacup. / Harry goes into Dino World when he needs help making up a story to go with his drawing.
episodes.title: Uh-Oh/Nobody's Listening to Me

episodes.synopsis: The dinosaurs take Harry to visit the wishing well in Dino World. / Harry becomes exceedingly bossy while pretending to be captain of a pirate ship.
episodes.title: I Wish/Yo Ho Ho

episodes.synopsis: Harry becomes a newspaper reporter for the day. / Harry can't have what he wants for breakfast, so he heads to Dino World, where he's created a diner.
episodes.title: Harry, Ace Reporter!/What's for Breakfast?

episodes.synopsis: When a visit to the beach is rained out, Harry heads to sunny, hot Dino World; sick in bed with a cold, Harry decides to go play in Dino World.
episodes.title: I Wish It Would Stop Raining/Achoo!

episodes.synopsis: When Harry pretends to be a superhero, his efforts to help his family only cause more problems. / Harry goes to Dino World to practice the violin.
episodes.title: Super Harry/Today's the Day

episodes.synopsis: Harry goes to Dino World to find some growth-enhancing milk. / Harry rushes to a flooded Dino World to keep the dinosaurs from drowning.
episodes.title: You're Too Little/Can You Hear a Drip?

episodes.synopsis: At his school's show-and-tell, Harry's dinosaurs are branded as old-fashioned. / Harry goes to Dino World to track down one of his red cowboy socks.
episodes.title: Who Says Dinosaurs Aren't Cool?/I Can't Find My Favourite

episodes.synopsis: Harry borrows Charlie's Sergeant Shout toy and takes it into Dino World. / Harry receives a box of magic tricks for Christmas.
episodes.title: I Promise/Abracadabra

episodes.synopsis: When Trike moans about his sore horn, Harry insists that he see the Horntist. / While playing with Charlie, Harry insists on being first on the swing.
episodes.title: I'm Not Going/Me First

episodes.synopsis: While playing a computer game, Harry loses his mother's report for her newspaper. / Harry and Charlie can't play football together without arguing.
episodes.title: Oops!/Goal!

episodes.synopsis: When Charlie invites Harry to a sleepover, he's only allowed to bring one dinosaur. / Harry goes to Dino World to learn how to make origami animals.
episodes.title: Who to Choose?/Origami

episodes.synopsis: Harry visits Dino World to make up games that he can win. / Harry heads to Dino World to clone himself so he can do a lot of things at the same time.
episodes.title: I Win!/Do Them All

episodes.synopsis: Harry has trouble staying inside the lines while coloring a picture. / Harry goes to Dino World in search of a cookie thief.
episodes.title: I Keep Going Over the Edges/Cookies

episodes.synopsis: Harry wants to keep an egg he found in a nest, but Nana says it wouldn't be right. / Harry goes to Dino World so he can stay up as late as he wants.
episodes.title: Can I Keep It?/I Don't Want to Go to Bed

episodes.synopsis: Harry and the dinosaurs learn that it's not fair to keep things that belong to others. / Harry is nervous about giving a speech to his classmates.
episodes.title: Look What I Found!/I Still Can't Hear You

episodes.synopsis: Harry learns that working as a team is better than fighting. / After watching a film about Cleopatra, the gang goes to Dino World to make Patsy queen.
episodes.title: To Outerspace/Hail the Queen!

episodes.synopsis: Returning from a day at a theme park, Harry finds that Steggy is missing. / Harry goes to Dino World to grow some roses quickly for Mother's Day.
episodes.title: Steggy's Not Here/Get Growing!

episodes.synopsis: Harry isn't allowed to join Sam's band because he's not good at playing drums. / Harry goes to Dino World to find what he needs to build a dream home.
episodes.title: Let's Rock/I Wish I Was a Builder

episodes.synopsis: Harry goes to Dino World to invent an ending for a bedtime story. / Harry and the gang create a make-believe circus in the garden for Charlie.
episodes.title: What Happens Next?/Circus

episodes.synopsis: Harry opens his own zoo in Dino World. / Harry sets off for Dino World to hand-deliver a letter addressed to a "Mr. Snow."
episodes.title: When I Grow Up/ The Mailman's Here

episodes.synopsis: Harry wants to surprise his mother by playing some music for her when she returns from shopping. / Harry decides to become a fireman in Dino World.
episodes.title: I Can Play Music!/Help!

episodes.synopsis: There's a new dinosaur in the house, and it belongs to Nana! / Harry wants to sleep in his new tent in the garden to practice his scouting skills.
episodes.title: It's in Nana's Room/Can I Sleep in My Tent?

episodes.synopsis: While playing a game of "I Spy," Harry can't remember the proper names of his dinosaurs. / Harry and Charlie argue over what the moon is made of.
episodes.title: I Spy/Is It Really Made of Cheese?
